title: Cell Culture Assay Part 1: Overnight Culture Prep
author: Opentrons
description:
This protocol performs cell culture assay part 1 of 3, which performs media addition to 24-well plate wells specified via CSV.

Links:
 Part 2: OD Calculation
 Part 3: Fluorescence Preparation

You will need:
 Corning Costar 24-well clear TC-treated culture plate
 Axygen single well high profile single-channel reservoir
 Opentrons P1000 Single-Channel Electronic Pipette
 1000ul Pipette tips
process:
Upload your CSV file and select the mount for your P1000 pipette.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
1ml of media is transferred to each specified well of the the 24-well plate.
notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

markdown.title: Cell Culture Assay Part 1: Overnight Culture Prep
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
This protocol performs cell culture assay part 1 of 3, which performs media addition to 24-well plate wells specified via CSV.

---

Links:
* [Part 2: OD Calculation](./1606-part2)
* [Part 3: Fluorescence Preparation](./1606-part3)

---

You will need:
* [Corning Costar 24-well clear TC-treated culture plate](https://ecatalog.corning.com/life-sciences/b2c/UK/en/Microplates/Assay-Microplates/96-Well-Microplates/Costar%C2%AE-Multiple-Well-Cell-Culture-Plates/p/3526)
* [Axygen single well high profile single-channel reservoir](https://www.fishersci.se/shop/products/axygen-single-well-high-profile-reagent-reservoirs-8/11360275)
* [Opentrons P1000 Single-Channel Electronic Pipette](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-pipettes/products/single-channel-electronic-pipette?variant=5984549142557)
* [1000ul Pipette tips](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips/products/opentrons-1000ul-tips)
markdown.process:
1. Upload your CSV file and select the mount for your P1000 pipette.
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
6. Hit "Run".
7. 1ml of media is transferred to each specified well of the the 24-well plate.
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.
